ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Added UPnP interface command AvMedia.GetItem - Improved camera widget - Fixed 'continuous Event Stream disconnection' bug when running on old mono ARM-hf (eg. Raspberry Pi) - Updated Spanish locales - Disabled periodic Weather Underground program notifications in the UI - Reverted XTenLib to the using of Thread instead of Task
